# Visit

## Hours & Admissions

### [Address](http://web.archive.org/web/20251130230124/https://goo.gl/maps/3vbV1hdXZPWCZmUa7)

[415 Couch Drive](http://web.archive.org/web/20251130230124/https://goo.gl/maps/3vbV1hdXZPWCZmUa7)  
[Oklahoma City, OK 73102](http://web.archive.org/web/20251130230124/https://goo.gl/maps/3vbV1hdXZPWCZmUa7)

### Hours of Operation

Monday-Tuesday:| CLOSED  
---|---  
Wednesday:| 10 am-5 pm  
Thursday:| 10 am-8 pm  
Friday-Saturday:| 10 am-5 pm  
Sunday:| 12-5 pm  
  
CLOSED: Monday, Tuesday, and Major Holidays (Independence Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas Day, and New Year’s Day)

### Museum Numbers

Visitor Services| 405.278.8237  
---|---  
Store & Bar| 405.278.8274  
Cafe| CLOSED  
Main Line| 405.236.3100  
Group Tours| 405.278.8213  
  
### [General Admission](http://web.archive.org/web/20251130230124/https://www.okcmoa.com/buytickets/)

Free| [Members](http://web.archive.org/web/20251130230124/https://www.okcmoa.com/membership/)  
Children (17 & Under)  
---|---  
$19.95 + tax| Adults  
$17.95 + tax| Seniors (62+)  
College Students  
$12.95 +tax| Active-Duty  
and Retired Military  
  
[ Buy Tickets ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251130230124/https://www.okcmoa.com/buytickets/)

### Parking

The Museum Parking Lot is located directly north of OKCMOA on the northwest corner of Hudson and Robert S. Kerr.  
**Rates are subject to change based on events.**

**Monday–Friday (until 6 pm):**  
• 30 min | $6  
• 1 hour | $9  
• 2 hours | $13  
• 8 hours ...

## [Current Exhibitions](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105043717/https://www.okcmoa.com/current-exhibitions/)

View our open exhibitions at the Oklahoma City Museum of Art. From delicate glass pieces to painted portraits, we have everything you are interested in.

__

## [Calendar](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105043717/https://www.okcmoa.com/events/)

Sign up for exhibition programming, film screenings in the Noble Theater, lively seasonal events, and more! There's always something exciting happening at OKCMOA.
